column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A group of 20-30 teenagers
column5: began a mass fight for unknown reasons around Koh Pich on the night of July 14
column7: in cooperation with the Koh Pich security forces
column8: intervened and arrested more than 10 people and sent them to the Chamkar Mon District Inspectorate overnight for questioning and legal proceedings. ------NKD
